last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 5
last_episode_to_air.overview: Simon has a realisation about the murder but can't convince the cops. Roza has a double celebration on Election Day.

name: The Bad Seed
overview: Two brothers from the same dysfunctional family, having escaped the desperate days of their early childhood, find their newly ordered lives falling apart when one becomes a suspect in a murder.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Simon Lampton looks like he has the ideal life, but everything unravels when neighbour, Julia Stevens, is murdered and Simon's dysfunctional childhood comes back to haunt him.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Simon begins to lose it emotionally as police pressure intensifies and his personal life crumbles. Ford helps and hinders his brother. Meanwhile, Roza drops a bombshell on Simon.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Roza finally confesses her secret to David. Karen's had enough of Simon's lying and kicks him out. Ford and Simon are forced to confront their violent father.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Karen and Roza declare war. Roza has an emotional breakdown and overdoses. Simon is suspected of the murder of an investigative journalist and Ford manipulates Simon's misfortune.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Simon has a realisation about the murder but can't convince the cops. Roza has a double celebration on Election Day.
